ingredients.item_name: Meat from an animal not slaughtered correctly (Maytah/Carrion)
Yeast Extract (from primary fermentation, e.g. molasses)
E151 - Brilliant Black BN, Black PN
E470 - Salts of fatty acids (unspecified source)
E471 - Mono- and diglycerides of fatty acids (unspecified source)
E471 - Mono- and diglycerides of fatty acids (plant source)
E472a - Acetic acid esters of mono- and diglycerides (unspecified source)
E472b - Lactic acid esters of mono- and diglycerides (unspecified source)
E472c - Citric acid esters of mono- and diglycerides (unspecified source)
E472e - Diacetyl tartaric acid esters of mono- and diglycerides (DATEM)
E473 - Sucrose esters of fatty acids
E475 - Polyglycerol esters of fatty acids
E477 - Propylene glycol esters of fatty acids
Cysteine (from human hair or pig bristles)
